skip_reason: Perfect score (5/5) - this critique type skips perfect scores

source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video clip presents a static, water-level view from inside a stark, tiled room that resembles a swimming pool. The scene is defined by the contrast between the clean, white-tiled walls and the dark, murky water, with a prominent dark, circular tunnel at the far end. The only movement is the gentle rippling of the water's surface.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video clip presents a static, water-level view from inside a stark, tiled room that resembles a swimming pool. The scene is defined by the contrast between the clean, white-tiled walls and the dark, murky water, with a prominent dark, circular tunnel at the far end. The only movement is the gentle rippling of the water's surface.
